alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:52PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hidalgo County through 415 PM MDT... At 352 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southeast of Alamo Hueco. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alamo Hueco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
